entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
